## 👋 About Me

I'm Thee Na, a 15-year-old student developer from Thailand, currently studying at Matthayomwatdansamrong School. I'm passionate about coding and continuously learning new technologies.

## 🚀 Skills and Interests

- 💻 Exploring various programming languages and technologies
- 🌱 Always eager to learn and grow
- 🎓 Student developer with big dreams
